title: The Greatest Gift
description: Daniel has never been anything but a burden to all who knew him. He's got big dreams, but no one will look far enough past his autism diagnosis to see them.Candace grew up in a home where she never felt like she was good enough. As soon as she could, she moved out to California to make a new life for herself.One day the two cross paths, and from that moment on neither of their lives are ever the same. Together they set out on a daring adventure across the country where they find unconditional love in the most unlikely of places.
author: Marie Tayse
